pages.text: 你的新魔法鱼竿有吸引生物的有趣特性。你那无聊栓线木棍怎么一直空军?我不知道。$(br)有了这个魔法，你可以进一步增加捕捉生物的机会。

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: 增加钓鱼时钓到生物的几率。$(br2)最高等级3$(br)适用于光谱世界的鱼竿。

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Big Catch by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Big Catch from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and experience for each additional level.
